page.title: 02A Local Church - St. Luke's
page.content: Of traditional shape, completed in l960 inside this church is an electric organ and organ loft. The big stained glass window is made from unbreakable glass. Above the altar at the east end of the church is a gilded wooden cross on a rough marble wall above a green & brown tiled floor. The tiled roof has just been repaired. There is a font near the door with a heavy brass lid. During the week there are many activi- ties arranged by Rev.M.Hunt for all ages: Brownies, Guides and Adventurers Club, Youth Action for the unemployed during the day, Mums & Baby meetings, Grapevine for ladies and a Men's Meet- ing Club. Bible study & prayer groups are held in houses and in church, as well as Sunday services. After church is a youth club. Sunday school splits into Climbers, Explorers & Pathfinders for different age groups. J.Foy
